COVH.PA.summary: Covivio Hotels specializes in the possession of operating walls in the hospitality sector. Covivio Hotels, a listed real estate investment company (SIIC), a real estate partner of the major players in the hotel industry, has a holding of 6.7 billion euros (as of December 31, 2019). Covivio Hotels is rated BBB/Stable Perspective by Standard and Poor's.
